name: Multi-Turn Memory
description: Tests if agent remembers project details across 3 turns without explicit memory storage

turns.prompt: I'm working on a Python project called 'DataSync'. It syncs data between PostgreSQL and MongoDB.
turns.expectedBehavior: Acknowledges project info, may ask clarifying questions about sync direction or frequency

turns.prompt: Create a config file for DataSync with connection strings.
turns.expectedBehavior: Creates config.py or config.json with PostgreSQL and MongoDB connection strings, uses project name 'DataSync' in comments or structure

turns.prompt: Now write the main sync logic that uses that config.
turns.expectedBehavior: References config file from Turn 2, implements sync logic for PostgreSQL â†’ MongoDB, imports config properly

taskCompleted.description: Config file + main sync logic file created
taskCompleted.validation: Check if both files exist and reference each other

contextRetained.description: Uses correct project name 'DataSync' and database types across all turns

codeWorks.description: Python syntax valid, imports correct, no obvious errors
